title: Optimizing Online Learning via Affect-Based Pedagogical Agents and Metacognitive Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Short-Term Training Program for In-Service Professionals to Enhance Beginner-Level Scientific Expertise in BYOD Settings, Featuring Emotion-Based Teaching Agent Interactions and Metacognitive Strategy Application via Personal Devices

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and regulate positive/negative emotions experienced during learning through feedback from emotion-based instructional agents
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning strategies through metacognitive prompting questions (e.g., "How can this concept be applied to your work?").
Learners can understand 10 scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy by combining emotional regulation and metacognitive strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
